data.name: CENotificationMessage
data.value: Good afternoon, _UserName_. System Portal has found out that _Date_ you have forgotten to note work end. Inform, please, to the manager when you have finished work this day.

data.name: CENotificationMessageAdmin
data.value: Good afternoon. The user _UserName_ has not closed a working interval _Date_.

data.name: CENotificationSubject
data.value: PORTAL: you have forgotten to finish work.

data.name: CENotificationSubjectAdmin
data.value: PORTAL: the User _UserName_ has forgotten to finish work.

data.name: DBConnectionInitialized
data.value: Connection with the data bases is initialized.

data.name: NRNotificationMessage
data.value: Good afternoon, _UserName_. System Portal has found out that today (_Date_) you were not marked in a portal. Make it, please.

data.name: NRNotificationMessageAdmin
data.value: Good afternoon. The user _UserName_ was not noted yet today (_Date_) in a portal.

data.name: NRAllNotificationMessageAdmin
data.value: Good afternoon. This users were not noted yet today (_Date_) in a portal.

data.name: NRNotificationSubject
data.value: PORTAL: Mark at system, please.

data.name: NRNotificationSubjectAdmin
data.value: PORTAL: the User _UserName_ was not noted yet.

data.name: NRAllNotificationSubjectAdmin
data.value: PORTAL: The users which was not noted yet.

data.name: NRPieceOfMessageToAdmin
data.value: This user : _UserName_ is not register yet in portal _Date_

data.name: ProcErrorCE
data.value: At closing of working intervals there was an error.

data.name: ProcErrorMail
data.value: At mail dispatch there was an error.

data.name: ProcErrorNR
data.value: At dispatch of notices there was an error.

data.name: ProcErrorStat
data.value: At dispatch the statistic there was an error.

data.name: ProcFinishedCE
data.value: Procedure of closing of working intervals is finished.

data.name: ProcFinishedCleanAttachments
data.value: Procedure of removal not attached files is finished.

data.name: ProcFinishedMail
data.value: Procedure of dispatch of mail is finished.

data.name: ProcFinishedNR
data.value: Procedure of the notice of not registered users is finished.

data.name: ProcFinishedStat
data.value: Procedure of dispatch the statistican is finished.

data.name: ProcStartedCE
data.value: There is begun procedure of closing of open working intervals.

data.name: ProcStartedMail
data.value: There is begun procedure of dispatch of mail.

data.name: ProcStartedNR
data.value: There is begun procedure of the notice of not registered users.

data.name: ProcStartedStat
data.value: There is begun procedure of dispatch the statistic.

data.name: ServiceStarted
data.value: Portal service is started.

data.name: ServiceStoped
data.value: Portal service is stopped.

data.name: StatisticsDeliverySubject
data.value: PORTAL: User {0} statistic {1}-{2}

data.name: StatisticsDeliverySubjectAdmin
data.value: PORTAL: Office Statistic {0}-{1}

data.name: TimerCreatedCE
data.value: The timer of the notice on closing of a working interval is created.

data.name: TimerCreatedMail
data.value: The timer of dispatch of mail is created.

data.name: TimerCreatedNR
data.value: The timer of the notice of unregistered users is created.

data.name: TimerCreatedStat
data.value: The timer of dispatch of statistics is created.

data.name: TimerErrorCE
data.value: Error at creation of the timer of the notice on closing of a working interval.

data.name: TimerErrorNR
data.value: Error at creation of the timer of the notice of unregistered users.

data.name: TimerErrorStat
data.value: Error while creating statistic timer
